channel.title: Hosting and coding
channel.description:
Hey everyone, im william from ToonScape/
Ive been making my servers and had about 150 on the other week. unfortunatly i had a glitch in my computer, it had sent my cmd haywire, spammed the hell out of my computer and wouldnt turn off. i sent it to the technicians and they got it fixed, but wiping ym entire collection of servers and my main server!
so here i am.. im willing to host and be a main coder for as long as i can, the server that i would host would be able to run twenty four seven. so if your intrested. have my msn and give me a go : suzuki-rm@hotmail.co.uk
do not flame/spam me about "oh im a noob blablabla" because you dont know me
but if you dont trust me? give me a shot and find out
Thanks
William from Toon ltd

item.title: Hosting and coding
item.dc:creator: @william1 william1
item.description:
@william1 wrote:

well im not adding anyone, if they need me, they can contact me. and the technician charged me £165 0.0 lol

Read full topic
